blink_anomaly_score.description: Blink rate and timing anomaly score. Lower is more normal.

landmark_jitter_score.description: Facial landmark jitter (std dev over time). Lower is more stable.

lip_sync_error.description: Lip-sync error (1 - correlation). Lower is better sync.

texture_artifact_score.description: Texture artifact score from frequency analysis. Lower is more natural.

pose_background_inconsistency.description: Head pose vs background motion inconsistency. Lower is more consistent.

watermark_prob.description: Watermark detection probability. Higher indicates generator watermark.

notes: Default feature statistics and weights. Should be calibrated on real dataset.
